headline: What Makes Lam Research (LRCX) a Good Long-Term Buy?
summary: Artisan Partners, an investment management company, released its “Artisan Value Fund” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Equity markets faced significant volatility in the second quarter, fueled by the announcement and subsequent pause of the “Liberation Day” tariffs. Against this backdrop, the fund’s Investor Class ARTLX, Advisor Class […]
